message: I'm offering a rare and exceptional item that has the potential to change your life. I've sold 0 out of 0 products so far, but I'm confident that this one is a gem. I'm willing to take a chance on your product, Alice. I appreciate your transparency and the special guarantee. I'll take the product and hope it's a high-quality one.
